reviewText: I was looking for a cheap copy of Sweeny Todd for a Christmas present and found this set, you cant beat the price!
I was looking for Sweeney Todd, but then stumbled along this two pack! And at first thought I was seeing things. But no! I bought it, and I am very happy with it! Thank you!

I originally bought these movies because they were cheap, and I just wanted to test my new Blu-Ray player.  I was already a fan of Depp, so I figured that I would give them a shot.  Both movies were very enjoyable to me.  They didn't help me test my Blu-Ray though, because they were kind of dark.  LOL
As expected I enjoyed watching these classics.  It works as expected. I's a great movie that I feel you can enjoy

Love the movies, Love the price all worth it. Sweeney Todd is great on Blu Ray picture and sound quality excellent. Sleepy Hollow also has a great picture and sound quality. Like I said the price is all worth it if you like these movies.
tim burton and Johnny depp were amazing! passionate and gripping and a great price! you cant go wrong buying these, they make a great movie night duo.

These two movies give Johnny Depp a great opportunity to show his acting range, and he doesn't disappoint.

"Sleepy Hollow" is perhaps the definitive film version of this well-known tale, though it is not for the faint-of-heart. It gets pretty gory, what with the Headless Horseman out and about his business. We tend to watch this film around Halloween...then see if we can get over its ghastly images by Xmas.

I saw "Sweeney Todd" on Broadway with Len Cariou, Angela Lansbury and Victor Garber many years ago. Cariou and Lansbury were spectacular. Garber, not so much - Sondheim's music for the male ingenue role is pretty ungracious, and neither Garber nor Jamie Campbell Bower in this film version has any success negotiating the vocal writing.

Depp's film Sweeney is a great deal more-frightening and disturbed than what I saw on B'way. That's possible in large part because he doesn't have to project his singing voice and stage persona into a live theatrical space (truth is Depp's singing voice wouldn't project well into the open space of a typical B'way theater without major amplification). That makes for a more-intimate, more-human portrayal, and it's fairly disturbing. The rest of the cast is good as well.

Both films were directed by Tim Burton who seems to get the best out of Depp. The "By The Sea" sequence in Sweeney is particularly touching in fleshing out the human sides of Todd and Mrs Lovett that might have been in a way that just isn't possible in the staged version.

If you want to enjoy Sweeney as a disturbed horror flick, get this version. If your main interest is hearing the music, get the 1982 "Tribute" version with Lansbury and George Hearn.

Recommended (the price is certainly right - I paid only $10.86 with tax for both movies!), but not for the squeamish.

Got it for a girl I've been hitting ons birthday, so I wanted it to be nice, it was exceptional. Came fast, came in the plastic brand new, not a scratch on them from delivery. And good deal for two movies
I've always adored Tim Burton's movies, but these were amazing! Johnny Depp is still by far my favorite actor and he does an amazing job in both.
This is just great I love jhonny depp's movies, especially the one's with tim burton so I was more than happy when they arrive and ready to popcorns hahaha. Don't miss it and buy them now.
This was an entertaining movie, and I love Johnny Depp, but just the same I only found it to be mediocrely memorable... which was disappointing for Johnny Depp.

I originally was only looking for Sweeney Todd but I was this set and decided to get it since it was the same price as Sweeney on it's own. So it was like buying 1 movie and getting 1 free.

As for the movies, the picture quality and sound are fanstastic!
It arrived on time, it was packaged perfect for the product, it was in great shape and we enjoy it.

I originally was purchasing the blu-ray of "Sweeny Todd" when I saw this two pack for the less then the price of just "Todd". Even if you're not a fan of "Sleepy Hollow" save your money, buy this and give the other as a gift to someone who is.

We wanted Sweeney Todd on DVD and we already had Sleepy Hollow, but it was on VHS.  This deal gave us the chance to get rid of one more VHS for a just a couple of dollars more.  Very happy with purchase.
Two great movies on blu-ray at one super price! Plus shipping was super fast as usual with amazon prime! PQ and AQ for both movies is great as well, especially Sweeny Todd!
I like both movies. Not academy award style but entertaining anyway. The price was good for a blu-ray two pack!
Both wonderful movies and glad to get the two pack for less than I would have had to pay for one alone.
Great movies at a great price.  A great buy for any Depp fan.  and the special features on sweenty todd is a must see.

Heck yeah!
Both movies are excellent and really showcase Johnny Depp's wonderful talent and both have full bonus features featured on both individual Blu-rays.
Well worth it!
Sweeney Todd isn't my favorite but it's still a good watch but i absolutely loved this version of sleepy hallow!!! Both are must haves for any collection.  You will not be disappointed!

Sometimes you're just in the mood to test how black your tv's blacks can be. With this dvd duo, you will have plenty of opportunity. Personally, my two favorite Depp films bundled together at a great price. You really can't go wrong here. The dvds contain plenty of extras if you're into that sort of thing too.
Love this combo pack! I bought it at just under $11 and mainly for Sweeney Todd. Definitely recommend this combo for Depp fans.
As a fan of Johnny Depp, it was great to get both these movies at a reasonable price. As always they came in great condition.
As a fan of Tim Burton, I bought this product to add to my collection. They came in a timely fashion and worked great!
I love anything Tim Burton so when I found this DVD pack it was perfect. The price was even better! Great Shipment timing too!
Both are what I expected. No real bonus feature but the quality is good and I was so happy to get both of these movie :)
Sleepy Hollow on bluray isn't anything special in the picture quality department, but Sweeney Todd looks and sounds great! It's also the better of the two Burton films, IMHO.

Both "Sweeney Todd" and "Sleepy Hollow" are excellent additions to any video library of "spooky" stories.
Johnny Depp is such a talented actor. He brings "believability" to each character.

When I saw this, and it was not much higher than Sweeny Todd on BluRay alone, I had to get it. The only downside is when I watch very dark movies on my PS3 they look grainy sometimes and thus did these two in parts. However that is expected with dark movies and overall they were fantastic! I loved how clear the scenes were and how affordable two very good movies were. They came each in their own dvd case but packaged in the same box. Whoever packaged mine put them too close together and the some of the side of the case of mine cracked off, but that is a small matter.
These are two good movies at a great price, I was very happy when I found them in a set for this little.
Very pleased with the purchase, both movies are my favorites for johnny, so the opportunity to get both for the price of one was a good deal.
Two of my favorite movies when I need a Tim and Johnny fix!!
Perfect!
One of my favorite movies, Sleepy Hollow appeared grainy quite often. Todd is a sleepy movie, but somehow I keep watching it every year.
Awesome! fast shipping A+++

I had never seen either of these but wanted to.  Sweeny Todd.....ugh...if it was a serious movie I think I would have dug it.  Instead, every time something interesting would happen....they would start singing a damn song.  Dark, acting and singing just don't work for me.  Sleepy Hollow was better....but kind of slow.
Blu-rays are the best when it comes to experiencing the great Tim Burton, how it is meant to be seen!!!!!!!!!!!!
Dvd worked great, wonderful picture and sound. I love Johnny depp. Haha. great christmas idea for younger kids if they like tim burton movies!
Awesome combo pack. These are cool movies for a great price. I received them quickly and in great condition. I would definitely recommend this purchase.
these were great movies, and my sons loved them! thx.
The overall picture quality of both of these blu-rays is less than the blu-ray standard most of us are used to as far as picture quality and sound but I found the movies very enjoyable anyway.
